title: Women at war
creator_credit: British Railways, Topical Press Agency and John Oliver
brief_description: Shows the response by the women of Britain during the second World War performing the multitude of tasks, normally carried out by men, necessary to keep the railways running efficiently.
creator_credit_for_label: British Railways, Topical Press Agency and John Oliver
